title: His, His or His?
description: Fame. Fortune. And all that. Everything I've never wanted.His, His or His? is the first book in a Contemporary Rockstar Reverse Harem Series by International Bestselling Author, Hanleigh Bradley.Clover has grown up with Rockstars for parents. They expect her to follow in their footsteps. But Clover doesn't want to be famous, she just wants to create the music she loves.Will that change when her twin brother needs her to take his place in the pop band Saving Creed?Her crazy mother puts a wig on her head, bandages up her boobs and throws her onto the stage at the London o2. Suddenly, she finds herself living with four hot men. The only problem? They all think she's her twin brother, Creed!Will Clover be able to keep her identity a secret or will she fall in love with her four band mates?His, His Or His? is the first book in the Lust & Lyrics Reverse Harem Series.She doesn't just want one. She wants them all."Think She's The Man meets the music industry."
author: Hanleigh Bradley
